cause.description:
Hi i know there are alot of people out there who do not understand about this illness,iam a sister that lived with that illness and i saw alot and i know alot and they are people too,i just want people to understand alot more and understand its not there fault it happend to them.So think twice before u judge.
Thanks
Heather Campbell
1. support schizophrenia
cause.name: schizophrenia
